actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional adjournment of the House from April 9 to April 21, 1987, and a conditional adjournment of the Senate from April 9, 10, or 11 to April 21, 1987.

summary.text: Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from April 9 until April 21, 1987, and of the Senate from April 9, 10, or 11 until April 21, 1987.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional adjournment of the House from April 9 to April 21, 1987, and a conditional adjournment of the Senate from April 9, 10, or 11 to April 21, 1987.
